data.message: The question is: Where is the dislike button?

replies.message: its suppose to be the angry button, lol
Still, instead of giving us a dislike button they added other emotions which were unnecessary.
The discrete grumpy face is dislike button
Hi Laurentiu. We've heard feedback that people would like a variety of ways to express themselves. Reactions will allow people to respond to a wide variety of posts shared on Facebook. -Kate
And where are the emotions for the comments !!?

Guys chill! :D They didn't add the Dislike button because Facebook ins't a place to hate.. In fact, i think they are trying to minimize the amount of hate here.. They did a good job with the reactions, please dont stress them for the good work! :)

I personally didn't see the need for any of them.  You either 'like' or ignore and scroll on.  For those that like them, that's fine too.  I think that there is enough arguing and hatred already.  Just my opinion.
Facebook we want dislike reaction too.. so badly need it.. :/

Mark Zuckerberg Facebook  my distribution company Record Union informed me to get  consent from you guys before they i can proceed with my record deal what must I do to gain permission consent for my song called Facebook love
HERE IS  THE DISLIKE BUTTON AS FOR AS I AM CONCERN. :) I LOVE Facebook THOUGH. <3 (Y)  :D
Facebook We need an animated/ flaming thumb! #FeelTheBern
We have wanted a Dislike button for the past 10 years and its the only update we never get. :(
well just write DISLIKE  and go on  because your are going to say something negative anyways.
It would be nice to disagree or dislike something.  Negative feelings are O.K.  It's not "hate" .  If people have to bottle it up inside it begins to stifle expression. That is not good
skip the angry button.  who wants to be angry?
Why are all the reactions gone today????
Rasmus Nørgaard Jensen I understand from where Facebook came from by not having the 👎.  To avoid cyberbulling but they should allow the dislike to Pages not people at least.

My phone sucks can't use this piece of sh$t, someone has iPhone locked I can't change or update passwords emails ,I can't do nothing but be locked out and I got a lot of sales ready for builds, so help if anyone has a phone for sale or free i be happy to invite you to Clint's fabulous night sales
Mucho que joden..!!
Javier: That is a solution of course, but some people will still be butthurt.. :/ I think it's perfect as it is..
I think the angry face is more hurtful than a simple thumbs down, but what do I know?

I don't think dislike equals hate.  Sometimes people update their status saying they are sick, had a bad day at work, got a car dent, etc. Those can use a dislike button . If your friends push dislike on things like your kids or wedding photos, then you just unfriend them, lol.
Rasmus Nørgaard Jensen Its's not hate that we are asking for...simply "dislike" or "thumbs down".
Wing Lee Chan I think they put the Sad face for those things instead of the dislike button... Show emotion instead of just a thumbs down..
